structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS

law.catch_line: Certified copies of resolution and ordinance admissible in evidence.

text.section: A copy of a resolution of the fiscal court declaring that there is need for an air pollution control district, duly certified by the county clerk, is admissible in evidence in any suit, action or proceeding.

A copy of an ordinance of the legislative body of the largest city within the county declaring that there is need for an air pollution control district, duly certified by the clerk of such legislative body, is admissible in evidence in any suit, action or proceeding.

law.history: Amended 2014 Ky. Acts ch. 92, sec. 65, effective January 1, 2015. -- Created 1952 Ky. Acts ch. 53, secs. 10 and 11, effective March 14, 1952.
